  • java.lang.Object
    • org.carrot2.mahout.math.AbstractMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<MatrixSlice>, Matrix, VectorIterable

    DenseMatrix, MatrixView

extends Object
implements Matrix
